Review.Titre: Product was crap, but shipped fast
Review.Contenu: Shipping was fast, but Quality control doesn't exist with Ghostek. Bought an S22 case, first one turned up with a broken clip and a power button that was permanently pressed in. Contacted ghostek. - they were very slow to reply. Eventually a replacement was sent, that turned up with guess what - an even more broken clip. Now I have 2 useless cases and still out of pocket over $100NZD.  Apparently I can get a refund if I ship the case back to the USA, but to do that would cost the majority of what I would be refunded anyway. Take your money and spend it elsewhere.

Review.Titre: Here I am receiving a review request and my case still hasn’t arrived. …
Review.Contenu: Here I am receiving a review request and I have yet to receive my iPhone case.I ordered the case in November 27th from the Black Friday sale. The shipping arrival date I was given was December 5th. It is now December 11th and the details from the tracking information doesn’t change for days at a time. Using DHL as the shipping company was mistake number one. I have sent an email to customer service but that obviously didn’t help at all. I stare everyday at my brand new iPhone 15 that I cannot use without a case. Had I known that it would be this long I would have ordered elsewhere. Very disappointed with this.

I do not like leaving negative reviews but Ghostek had terrible customer service.  Did not help one bit in resolving an issue.  Not one bit.Update: Don't let them fool you.  I did NOT place an order after requesting 50% off.  Ghostek sent out an email where you had to try and find the 50% off code on a word find puzzle.  There was so many different words to try.  I tried at least 15 of them.  When I went to submit another word, the screen on my phone adjusted and I ended up hitting order instead of submit code.   I IMMEDIATELY contacted Ghostek customer service via their website AND Facebook messenger to alert them of the issue.   Immediately.  They do not provide a phone number to contact customer service anywhere.  I told them the situation and that I'd like to cancel my order or keep the order of they would honor the promo.They, conveniently for them, contacted later, after it was in the "shipping process" and asked for the email that contained the word find for the promo code.  I immediately sent it to them and they responded they couldn't do anything.  Didn't offer me any kind of discount. Just said I could pay to return the case.Why also would you send out an email with a word find in which there could be 100 different words that may be the correct option??  Just want to waste everyone's time or just hope they accidentally hit purchase instead of clicking the button to submit the code??  Unprofessional all around.

Review.Titre: I ordered a cell phone case
Review.Contenu: I ordered a cell phone case, I got a shipping confirmation email. After seven days there was no update on the shipping. It just stayed the same. I communicated via email stating that I had not received my item yet even though I got a shipment confirmation email. They stated that they had discontinued the item at that time. It was still listed on the website. It was also listed on eBay and Amazon for my particular phone. I requested that I would be sent another case that was listed on the website. However, they refunded my money for the case maybe I’m wrong but I felt like waiting seven days and I had to email to check on the status of order. So my main complaint was someone waited seven days even though I had a shipping confirmation to tell me that they no longer sold it so why send a shipment confirmation that it had shipped when it really didn’t. I run a company I understand customer service I totally do so I feel like I should’ve gotten a case comped because nobody asked me if I wanted to refund or order something else at equal lesser value.
Requested 2 refunds/returns and never was given the ability to do so. Customer service took way too long to respond.

I purchased the waterproof one.  No complaints about the quality of the case but you can barely hear anything out of it.   That is my only complaint but hearing is important.
The shipment is too slow , ordered on 15th Feb , received it on 1st March is scarily slow , the package itself is lightweight , should not have taken such a long time to reach destination .

I ordered the "Galaxy S23 Series Waterproof Cases with Holster Clip — NAUTICAL - Galaxy S23 Plus / Clear" (Order Number: 152680) on July 14, 2023, and here are the following reasons why I did not like the service I received from ghostek:1. Even though the confirmation email said my product was shipped on July 15th (from New Jersey), I only received it today (July 27);2. Because I never received a response to TWO "Contact Us" messages that I sent ghostek re: the product that I ordered, my wife ordered another case through Amazon yesterday & that product was at my door TODAY (meanwhile it took ghostek 13 days to deliver their product); and, lastly,3. The "Tracking" info. that ghostek sent me was absolutely bogus.  When I clicked on the Tracking button (which I did numerous times over the past 13 days). all it ever said to me was, "En Route" & I had no way of finding out how close it was to being delivered to my door.  Additionally, when I went to DHL's website directly & put in the crappy Tracking number that was provided to me by ghostek, their website said the number was erroneous!All-in-all, a very frustrating experience buying a ghostek product (but they certainly have the right name - the company is "ghost-like" in their delivery & communication with their clients)!  I will not be shopping for any products offered by this company again & I will be leaving a Google review too!Bert.

This product is absolute garbage. My phone fell from a two-foot shelf onto a mat and the screen shattered inside this case. On their website, they advertise that the case can withstand a twelve-foot fall. This is blatantly false advertising. I tried to get a refund through Amazon, but that was useless. I then tried to get a refund from the company directly, which was useless. Do not buy this case.  *EDIT* The company did finally own up to the product problem and did give me a refund.

Review.Titre: I love the case but disables Pixel 8 pro temperature sensor

Does not read correctly under any circumstances.  I hope that thos issue can be rectified in the deign of this product or I may need to return.  I know many do not use this feature but I have found many practical uses for this that I have already integrated into my life. Is there a revision of this product that addresses this issue.  If there is not I would like a refund or return.  I have already wasted applying one of my magsafe compatibility magnets to this case.I want to like this. It's perfect for me in every way except for this fundamental, important flaw.  Please contact me to come to a resolution.

iPhone 15 Pro case is very disappointing. The case has no button, just a recess provided with a waterproof membrane, to operate the function button on the phone. You need very narrow fingers to operate it. The membrane is likely to be damaged. The foam sheet located around the camera lenses on the case disintegrated leaving little bits of black foam on the lenses.

Review.Titre: Samsung Z Fold 5 Exec - Product Lacking
Review.Contenu: Samsung Z Fold 5 Exec case not brilliantly made/designed - the front screen edge on the left/hinge side tends to be compressed slightly by the sliding hinge cover.  This slight compression causes the edge to pop-up away from the front screen and warp slightly obscuring it.  The sticky strip is obviously intended to mitigate this effect but it doesn't do a great job and ends up becoming a pocket-fluff magnet.I also didn't feel the manufacturing or material quality of the bike mount was particularly good for the price either - quite thin-walled plastic throughout.Logistics of ordering all good, but as I said, I wouldn't highly rate the product itself.

But that’s on me.My issue is that as lovely as the case looks, it doesn’t offer much protection and it’s slippery. I’ve very nearly dropped my phone 10 times a day since I put this case on just because the plastic is smooth and doesn’t offer any real grip. I feel like the grey plastic needs to be less smooth, either change of material or add texture to it so you don’t drop it. It does have little plastic strips either side of the case but they are made out of the same smooth plastic and are almost flush with the metal part of the case, so don’t really do much.I will be changing out my case asap. I feel like with the lack of overall coverage with how slippery this case is I am going to drop my phone and break the damn thing.

Review.Contenu: I ordered an allegedly mag safe compatible case for my iPhone 12 mini and the NRG wireless car charger. The case was not mag safe compatible, and even if it was, it is not large enough to place a mag safe magnet on it to allow it to attach to the charger. So, I had to by a different case from another company to use the charger. I submitted a review already for both of these items and neither were posted on the website, which raises more questions. They dispute that it was represented as such, but to this day, it is.

The case has a built-in magnet. The magnet did not align up with the wireless charger. It did not wirelessly charge correctly. By placing the magnet 2 mm above the current placement, it would have rectified the issue. Poor placement of the magnet

I swipe from the sides to go back, and also do gaming on the phone, making this very inconvenient option. I was super excited to get this case with the spine cover for the phone, but disappointed in the design for the front screen, causing me to choose to not use.

I own a Samsung zfold4, and recently purchased the Ghostek Covert clear case that provides exceptional protection for my zfold4. I absolutely loved the case.... But then just a week into having the case on my phone, my inside screen started becoming unresponsive to my Spen and touch from fingers. I then used the "create a note" feature and covered every area of the inner screen with the pen. This was when I realized that the two magnets from the Covert's Binger protection had ruined my screen in the exact two areas of where the magnets are with the phone unfolded, and the two ruined circular areas on my inside screen are about the size of a half dollar coin. As a result of this, I'm not able to file a warranty claim and have to use an insurance claim that is going to cost me $250 to replace my zfold4, and it's not by fault from me that I'm having to spend money because of a problem caused by the Ghostek Covert case. The customer service response to my problem was not treated with care nor was this problem escalated to higher authorities in the Ghostek management team.

I ordered a new case for my S22 Ultra. I got the executive with the detachable card wallet. I also ordered the NRG mount. It took almost 2 weeks for my order to arrive, with very little assistance from customer service except to "wait longer" and a tracking link that I already had.  When my order finally arrived I was very disappointed in the product. The wallet is not flexible and only holds a couple cards and is cumbersome to use. The detachable feature needs work as well. The NRG mount was the most disappointing. The magnet isn't strong enough to hold my phone and case without any cards in the wallet. It was completely unusable.  I immediately boxed it all back up for return. Additionally, they sent a card with a QR code for instructions but the video that was supposed to be linked was not available.**In response to the company reply, when asked by trustpilot I updated info in my review to include my order number 137241. Only holding 3 cards would not be a huge problem but the wallet makes it cumbersome and difficult to access the cards. Taking the wallet off is easy but it doesn't go back on as easily.  As far as the NRG mount concerns, I was searching your site by device and that mount came up as an accessory.  While I am not happy with the product or shipping time, I remain hopeful that the return process won't be too difficult.

Review.Titre: Took almost two weeks to get here and…

I have a GHOSTEK case for my old phone.  It has overall lasted better than the life proof and people can hear me better than the otter box. So I purchased the nautical slim for my iPhone 14.  Fit is good. Waterproof as expected. Button control is much better than the iPhone 8 design in which the silence mode dial is useless.  However, I totally forgot about how poor the customer service is.  I never heard back on warranty for my iPhone 8 case that the charge port rubber plug failed.  The only way to contact them is email.  They don’t read the whole email before responding. Which then takes additional emails and time to get an appropriate answer.  Glad I finally did receive my new cases.  They look like they will stand up.
I not receive my order  for incorrect address format in your sender proveedor

Review.Titre: Good cases, long time to get
Review.Contenu: I haven't received my ordered Ghostek cases for my iPhone 15 Pro Max and Galaxy Z Fold5 phones. I ordered this last November 26. The cases look good on the website. DHL tracking was last updated November 29. I sent a message and was told that there might be delays with the (US) customs. This was my first time to order phone cases from the States. Most of the other branded cases I have bought were shipped from HK.(Reply, update)As delays are expected and could reach 30 business days for the delivery to be fulfilled, there is very limited visibility in tracking the package. I have experienced DHL package tracking here in Asia and they provide timely, relevant updates including customs delays. Thirteen calendar days have passed without any updates from the tracking.

We ordered two covers. Good communication regarding tracking delivery. Unfortunately one of the covers wasn't the color ordered. Upon contacting I was told they didn't have the color ordered. I would have liked to be able to decide if I still wanted the cover in another color or money returned. I wasn't.

Review.Titre: Difference from earlier versions make this version awkard.

Al's product shape is awkward, wider back panel, makes it difficult to pick up and constantly looking at the back instaes of the front, it just seems ergonomics would have the front panel wider or same size.  The waterproof panel at the changing port is better than earlier version.  Did not like the fingerprint sticky side on the screen protector, it shows a dot, and I don't use fingerprint biometric.  The case is engineered well and will function as designed, it just is awkward compared to an earlier version

My previous case had a hinge, a full back and cover over the front screen, it was a generic case for a third of the price. I think simply adding a spring to the hinge would get the case to where it needs to be. Very awkward to have to close every time.

Review.Titre: I wouldn't buy this one again.
Review.Contenu: It appears to have taken 4 or 5 days for the case to be mailed, then another 3 to arrive.  The tracking sucked.  I bought another cheaper case from Amazon to protect the phone during the uncertain wait.  The application process was confusing.  I had to remove and reinstall 3 times, and will be stuck with a smudge in the fingerprint area.  It will be difficult to access the stylus if my fingernails are recently trimmed, and the voice assistant can't hear me unless I speak directly into the bottom of the case.  3 stars might be high.I'll probably buy the cheaper version of the Covert model, which is what I wanted in the first place.  I had it on my last phone and loved it, but I'll buy it through Amazon so I can reliably track it and know what to expect.

I am a big fan of creators of cases for folding phones. However, this case for the Fold 4 (EXEC) is not great. It fits the phone alright, but the bezel around the outer screen makes the phone way harder to use. There also is no outer screen protector built in. I also find the three card capacity of the "wallet" attachment way too limiting. My last case cost me $20 and was more useable in every way. That being said, its durability left something to be desired after about a year of use it was a loss. Sadly the product is not sold anymore and ghostek advertised at just the right time.

Review.Contenu: The protective S22 was good quality, however the instructions for assembling the case left a lot to be desired.The Blutooth ear buds were another story. They won't hold a charge long enough to pair, and when they do indicate they are paired with the TV, the sound is intermittant or not at all.Not worth the money, Don't buy them!

Review.Titre: I loved this case until less than…

And a week ago my screen shield cracked, eventhough the edges are higher than the phone screen.  I want to buy the same one again, because I love it so much, but the same thing will happen in a few months.

Material and look is awesome. However I had to modify certain areas. Case around fingerprint recognition was too bulky, when you unfold the phone. Case covers selfie button on small backscreen. So I cut it off. Basically transformed it to the original Samsung case.

Case itself is very good quality, wallet portion only holds 2 cards. 3 will make it not click closed. Unfortunately for me, as I have to carry 2 cards (I prefer to use my Discover & it's not accepted everywhere so I need a back up card too) plus my ID, I'm still on the hunt for a true 3 card wallet phone case.

Review.Titre: Good start but room for improvement!
Review.Contenu: To be honest, I was a bit disappointed in the case but I am trying to get used to it. A few things that could be made better:1. The case only attaches near the hinge but the hinge is pretty tight so when I go to open the case, it often slips off the front of the phone - not to the point where it completely dislodges but enough to be annoying.2. The bezel is thick enough that it covers the navigation button at the bottom of the screen. I often have to try 3 or 4 times to swipe off an app.3. The card case is a little too thin to be helpful. Ideally, I could travel without a wallet if I could carry my license, swipe card and 1 CC but I can only fit 2 of the 3 so I need to carry a wallet anyway.4. It would also be helpful if the card case attached in either direction so you could kickstand the phone in more than one orientation, but the magnet only works in 1 specific place.5. The hinge cover is odd - it just sort of flops around and feels unfinished. Would be better if it were a little tighter and less bulky - maybe even use a vinyl cover that's contiguous with the front and back cover?

Review.Titre: Customer service was good and Cas came…
Review.Contenu: Customer service was good and Cas came fast but the screen protector is plastic and shows wear rapidly. There are cheaper cases this same quality like the body glove waterproof which is almost exactly the same and cost half as much as ghostek nautical slim.

Review.Titre: I WAS a big fan of ghost tech
Review.Contenu: I am a big fan of ghost tech. However I recently purchased purchase the exec six for the pixel fold. I reached out to customer care because the case absolutely does not work and the magnetic wallet holder turns off the main screen no matter what you do. The adhesive does not work for this specific case as well as the hinge protector is a floating hinge protector that does not actually connect to the phone and wobbles back and forth. These are huge issues for a phone like this, especially a phone that cost $1,800. The case is $60 and I emailed them so they can replace the case with a different case. Instead of replacing the case with something that works, they sent me the exact same non-functional case. I don't know if I can trust them again if this is not rectified. If they rectify the situation, I will be happy to change this review and update everyone on the outcome.

Review.Titre: Beautiful, but some scratches were out of the box.

One of them (for Pixel) arrived with scratches out of the box (I have photos if needed). Also not very nice that because of the polished back side of the Pixel fingerprints are very recognizable on the back side of the case that is made with glass. For iPhone, everything was perfect, MagSafe worked pretty well, and fingerprints on the back side of the case are not recognizable because of the rear phone material mat. Also, it was without any scratches out of the box. Delivery to NL was quite expensive that is why I was upset because of the case issues.

Love the case and design overall, however, a couple of minor faults prevent me giving a better rating. The leather on the back looks and feels great, but it's not accurately cut or glued. A couple edges fraying up. It's just not square with the rest of the case. I would expect a bit better quality for the money. For how much it costs, it should be nearly perfect, and mine just isn't which is disappointing. I get the feeling that the small piece of leather will be the first part that fails and makes me question the long-term durability. One minor subjective gripe i have is how slippery the case is. Some micro knurling on the aluminum sides would go a long way to adding grip and still look and feel great.

Review.Titre: Case is good offers great protection…

I like the case quality. But I don't like the service.  I ordered case and I paid for it then you told me that it is not available. So if it's not available why you guys show it to the customers online.

If you are ordering from Western Canada be aware, products will take awhile to be delivered. I was a little disappointed that it took 3 weeks to get here after paying 17.00$ for shipping. As for the case itself (nautical slim for the 23 ultra) it's definitely a quality constructed case. I work as a tradesman and I have no doubt this case will fully protect my phone from drops or dust etc. The size is what I expected, it doesn't really add too much extra bulk to an already large phone.the sound quality does suffer a little. The phone is completely sealed in the case and the sound ports are blocked off but it doesn't really bother me to much.Accessing the pen is also a bit tricky, if you trim your nails it's going to be a pain to pull the pen out.I'd give the case 4 stars but the wait time brings my review down a star for the overall purchasing experience.

Review.Contenu: I like the product and the protection it gives my phone. I would give your support and product a 5 star! I do not like the shipping method you use to ship your products. It should not take 16 days for me to receive my phone cases! That's totally ridiculous! Change the shipping method or the shipper otherwise I will not order another product from you!

Review.Titre: After 4 months, scratches make it impossible to use in sunlight
Review.Contenu: So, I've had my ghostek protector for 4 full months now, and it's been great at protecting the phone from drops. However, the screen is so incredibly scratched I cannot read the phone in bright sunlight at all. I need to shade it with my body, and that's not always possible. I put the phone in my pocket, and my pockets may have dust or crumbs from horse treats (which are basically made out of dry compressed hay), so while it's a constant presence, it's not particularly rough. I noted in my original review that the clarity of the fingerprint sensor circle is noticeably better (distractingly so) than the clarity of the surrounding screen protector.that continues to be the case. I wish that ghostek could include the same adhesive covering the entire screen to enhance clarity. Finally, the scratches are also protecting the photo lense protector, so my photo quality is not as good. I may be going back to traditional glass protectors and pelican cases, as the scratches plastic will not be workable in the summer sun. Hope they continue to work on improving the design.

Review.Titre: I really didn't get to use case.
Review.Contenu: I really didn't get to use case at all...I use fingerprint all the time with my phone .. Google 6... And it's not working with the case... I'm disappointed because I was looking forward to waterproof option of case...

Review.Titre: The case comes off too easy when…

Review.Titre: It's a nice phone case but

Review.Contenu: Service was great shipping was fast. Seems to be a quality product but I'm not a huge fan of how the case actually feels in the hand. It is quite slippery. A rubberized coating on the plastic part of the case may have been a better option.

Review.Titre: Wish I could have test drove it....
Review.Contenu: This is one time where I really wish I could have test driven this case before purchasing.  I have a new S23+  and wanted stylish protection for it.  I've used Lanhiem in the last, and really like them but there was always an issue with the microphone cover.  After reading the reviews on the Ghostek Natical Slim, people were reviewing that while the case had microphone issues in the past, the issues seemed to be resolved on the new cases.  Sadly,  I can't say that's true.  When making calls,  people not only say they can't hear me well,  but that there is a lot of distortion.   No idea why.  My phone was brand new, out of the box.  Its also a bit more slippery than I like.  There's no grip to it.  It's a hard shell plastic all around, sleek and gorgeous, but SO slippery! Not sure what I'm going to do about this issue.  It wasn't a cheap purchase! 🫤

Review.Titre: The kick stand on my case has a magnet…
Review.Contenu: The kick stand on my case has a magnet issue not secured in place and stand would not stay in closed position, I added some guerilla glue to magnet....so far so good. Case is very good, would buy again.

Review.Titre: I expected something a bit different
Review.Contenu: I was under the impression the case would have a front cover it did not. The plastic is somewhat ridged but I thought the case would have a tougher feel to it.  The aluminum color is cool. I did contemplate sending the case back. I also purchased the hand strap. Would I recommend it? Ummm, maybe not this case. NO

Review.Titre: It's ok, constantly have to remove the case
Review.Contenu: Encases the entire phone which is good for protection. Sound isn't great with the case on. I have to remove the case anytime I want to charge my phone. Also have to remove the case anytime I'm in the car because it doesn't fit the car phone holder with the case on.

Unfortunately, I am not a big fan of the angle that my phone now sits at with stand that I purchased. It does seem to be good quality but I have to prop it up on other objects to get my phone at the angle I like to watch things on my phone.

Review.Titre: You REALLY need to work on the design
Review.Contenu: There are a few things that could be improved. The case needs to fit snug against the phone & have the edge raised all the way around the screen on the phone. There's no raised edge around the screen when the phone is open. It's flush with the edges of the phone screen. You drop it, when open, & it's going to get screen damage. That's not good. The top piece needs to fit right against the cover screen. As it is, there is quite a gap between the cover screen & the case. That isn't good. You don't want dust & all sorts of other things getting in there & gunking up the screen & the case. I paid good money for this case, & it took forever to get it to Texas from Brooklyn. Y'all need to DUMP DHL as your shipper. Go with UPS or USPS. I've only had the case for 9 days, & I'm beginning to wish I had gotten the Otterbox Defender.

Belt clip stand does not keep the phone up after a month of use. The clip doesnt even stay clicked in place to create the stand. For a $60 dollar case and to not have that feature is not worth it even the look of the case.
Excited to receive my new case but was sent a case for the wrong phone, replacement will take a while to get here which i think i should have been compensated with expedited shipping.

Product was nicely packaged, good video showing how to attach it to phone. Product itself is a little more bulky then expected but seems like it will be fairly protective. It slips out of your hand more then I thought it would. It does have some silicone grip but very little and no sling or ring to put your finger through like some of the competition. I find that very disappointing. The hinged protects the phone but is larger then I thought and gets in the way when opening the phone and setting it on the table such that it rocks or falls over when interacting with the phone. The case looks nice and I'm sure I will appreciate its protection however the cost was very high compared to other brands. I also bought the attachable ring so that I can hold on the phone better but it was difficult to attach the phone. I attached it to the front because I still wanted to use the magnetic charging but there was less space on the front of the phone to put it which makes holding a little more awkward but still better then without. If someone asked me if I would recommend the case I would tell them to try something cheaper first
I have been using ghostek since last year, but when I bought it again for s23 ultra, the edges are quite sharp and the fingers don't glide over them.
Case is protective, but it messes up the functions of the side quick app function and pulling down to check my notifications. Fix that and I can easily rate as a 5

Edit: It's a terrific case, and will likely prove to be the best case I've ever used. Thus far, I am very happy with it.To be fair, yes, I input the incorrect address (well, the autocomplete did, and I didn't realize it until the order was submitted); however, I caught it immediately, and requested help fixing the error within a time frame that should have been doable. I'm firmly of the opinion they ought to have been able to do something for me at that point.At any rate, yes, the neighbour did hold on to the case, and I was able to pick it up from them (because it so happens that the incorrect address was nearby).The case itself, thus far, feels splendid. It seals the phone seamlessly into military-grade shock-dissipating material; it covers/protects the camera bar (not all Pixel 7 Pro cases do that), as well as the screen (no more fumbling to install those screen protectors requiring surgical dexterity and precision); and the lanyard provides an extra level of security against dropping the phone off a cliff, into a river/lake/ocean, down a sewer grate, etc...) And it does all this without adding excessive bulk. The phone still looks sleek and svelt, it does not look like a tank attachment.

Review.Titre: i wish it was more grippy
Review.Contenu: i wish it was more grippy, i thought the sides would be silicone/rubber feel but they are more of a plastic feel, the back gets oily/greasy quickly, for the price it's an "okay" case, can't comment on durability or yellowing yet, time will tell

Review.Titre: Strong but the back gets nasty really fast
Review.Contenu: The case is sure, very strong and looks cool, but it is not very comfy. Surely, I could deal with that.However, the transparent back is, for me, a nightmare because it is full of fingerprints and I find it a bit cheap compared to the rest of the case :(.I really wanted to love it, but the back of the case is a big problem for me.
The product description isn’t accurate. It’s the same for the nautical and nautical slim case but the back is not clear on both. One is clear and one is transparent.
Great overall - I think this case would be even better if just a little thinner
Nice build but screen protector scratches easy. And inside of screen protector isn't easily able to be cleaned from dirt and grim.

Review.Titre: Front case doesn't work for me
Review.Contenu: Front case doesn't work for me. I cleaned it, wipe it and nothing. I dont even have a film/glass on the screen and the fingerprint is not working even if I have the sensitive mode on. Oveall is a beautiful, full secure case. It just not working for me. I dont know why

I like  the back part of the case. However the front looks cheap.  Kind of 3d printed finished.  The screen protector holds bad fingerprints which make it look really bad. The good things It seals perfectly  and the touch feels almost like the phone glass screen.

I really like the case!! It’s thin-exactly what I needed, but the screen protector wasn’t as sturdy as it should be. It’s has a crack in it already, small but it’s there. My case before was just too bulky, but the screen protection part held up.

I did not like the fact that the phone case did not have a front protector for the phone screen. Just like the back of the phone. I'm not too sure if it was missing or if that's how it comes. Now, I have to buy a screen protector for the front screen.

Review.Titre: You get what u pay for
Review.Contenu: Phone overheats in case when on wireless charging

Review.Titre: I have purchased 3 mini phone covers…
Review.Contenu: I have purchased 3 mini phone covers from you in recent years.  My first two were great!This last order in pink had a back piece so rigid that I could not remove not even one card.  I asked for a return authorization but instead I was sent a black piece that is much more flexible and I can remove my two cards easily.I now have a phone that works but it is two toned.  I’ll keep it but don’t have a good feeling on how this was handled.  I my opinion the first back piece in pink was not made correctly and this is your way of addressing the problem without actually admitting that the first back piece was wrong.If you’d have let me return the pink I would have bought a whole new black cover and felt better about the whole  process.Your covers are convenient so I’ll probably stick with you.  Thanks for listening.I would like to add that my husband who doesn’t have any medical issues could not remove a card from the new pink back cover; we feel it is not made correctly.  I’m able to use the new black back cover myself.  They need to review their new product fir flexibility.
Had my case for a few months. Within the first month the screen protector has already separated from the top of the case. Otherwise seems like a good case.

Review.Titre: Very solid case and will protect your…
Review.Contenu: Very solid case and will protect your phone no doubt. The issue is every use. It really makes the phone blocky with how thick it is which might be a good trade for some people. For me it's 50/50. It can feel like a brick most days carrying phone around. The good part about the design that I like is the clear backing so that I can show off my custom skins 😎. The biggest flaw with this case has to be the fingerprint reader cutout. It takes a lot of time unlock my phone using my finger print. This the main reason for my 3 stars. If that flaw can be fixed I think the extra weight and blocky feel of the phone won't be so bad.

I work in a bakery where flour is flying around in the air, I bought Themis case because it said it was water and dust proof, I still have to take it apart every night when I get home and blow all the flour out of my phone and case.

Review.Titre: The product didn't look anything like…
Review.Contenu: The product didn't look anything like what was advertised on the website.

Review.Titre: The carrying case is slippery hard to hang on to.
Review.Contenu: The waterproof carrying case that I bought was supposed to be easy to hang on to but it is so slippery it is hard to hold on to.

Review.Titre: An alternative case that does its job
Review.Contenu: I was looking for something different that had the waterproof features and the MagSafe compatibility. The otter boxes are far expensive and bulky. I used to use the lifeproof cases but they started to lose it quality over time. I saw this case on Amazon wanted to to try it out. I mean, you spent over $1,400 for a device you need to protect it. The only complaint I have is there’s no was to hear the person you’re speaking to through the case unless you put the call on speaker and remove the charging port cover. The iPhones have stereo sound and the case blocks the ear piece speaker so you can’t hear music or regular phone conversations clear, they sound muffled. The other complaint is the rear camera. When you zoom out to 0.5, the case shows a “fish eye lens” to the picture unwanted. I think the case lifts up from the phone and doesn’t stay in place. Other than that, it’s a better alternative to the other waterproof cases in the market.

Really nice cases but...However they do not hold up long term. I had bought one for my Note 20 Ultra, and 2 years later the plastic is all foggy, yellowed, and looks terrible. For what they charge for these, they should hold up longer than a couple years. I purchased 2 different ones for my S23 Ultra and have concerns about their longevity. I've had cases that cost a fraction of what these do that are still looking great on my Note 20 Ultra. I am extremely meticulous how I take care of my phone and cases. RESPONSE TO GHOSTEK, As I said, I have off brand cases that cost a fraction of what the Ghostek cost for my Note 20 Ultra and they still look great 2 years later. It's not me, or how I take care of the cases, its the cases. If all my cases looked bad I'd agree it could be how I'm taking care of them, but it's not me. I'm not really surprised Ghostek implied its how I used and took care of the cases for my Note 20 Ultra. Sad that companies jump to blame the customer.

Review.Titre: The color scheme of the case I found to…
Review.Contenu: The color scheme of the case I found to be dull, I was not excited about the pink case it seems so subdued. I had higher expectations.

Review.Titre: The case is great but the hing…
Review.Contenu: The case is great but the hing attachment that covers the hing could be better constructed I have to keep pushing it in and that I don’t like

Review.Titre: The screen protector is really bulky…
Review.Contenu: The screen protector is really bulky and makes it very difficult to use the finger scanner. It is also uncomfortable to talk on the phone.

Review.Titre: piece broke off within a week
Review.Contenu: the charging port cover’s pull-tab ripped off within a week. opening the charge port cover without the little pull-tab is difficult. everything else about the case is great.
The case does seem to be very protective but I don’t like how slippery the back of the case is. I wish there was a texture that would make it easier to hold.

Review.Titre: I like that the case is protective
Review.Contenu: I like that the case is protective, but was disappointed it didn't have a front screen protector like other cases for this phone do.

Review.Titre: Bit cheap plastic feel to it
Review.Contenu: Bit cheap plastic feel to it, would love it to be nice silicone. The screen protector and lens protector are great.

Review.Titre: Front screen edge was difficult to touch.
Review.Contenu: I love the design of magnetic case but at the edge of outside screen is too hard to press the screen or swipe.
Company is probably great but the case for the fold 4 is off size on the front screen, waste of money.

The delivery time was good.My problem is with case.The volume button is very hard to operate. Have to push hard in just the right spot to get the volume control to work. Other than that the case good.

I really enjoy the metal and rubber that they use on the case, however my reason for it being a 3 star is the person preference for a more boxier feel in hand and the case being less bulky would be nice in hand for me personally, I hope that one day you all decide to try a design in that manner with those colors and special designs especially for a Google pixel device... Message me personally I want to be the first to try it out.

Got the red case. Wish it was a little darker. Comes off as pink in the right light. Also it doesn't seem to fit my phone perfectly. You can see certain parts of my phone where it's not flush. Quality and feel are good though.

100% honesty......I am more than happy with the phone case hands down. It's sleek and provide plenty protection with out the bulkyness......but the clip needs to be redesigned I'm active and my work is active...I am up and down and in and out of equipment the slightest bump or jump and the phone falls right out of the clip.....aggravating worries me that it will catch the right edge of steel or have that just right moment.       If you guys and gals come up with a better clip or fix it would be bullet proof look forward to some feedback

Great looking case and build quality is definitely there. Nice chunky feel. But 2 little things couldve been better. 1st, case is thick on the sides and makes it hard to reach to sides on the screen. 2nd, volume and power buttons are not covered thats fine but because case is thick it makes reaching them hard as well. 4 stars from me. Fit finish great. Feels expensive.

The advertising for the case and Ghostek in general is very well made. It really hypes the product to a point that it's hard to be fully satisfied. The sound quality, if you need to make a call using the phone is as you would expect with a waterproof case, there no miracle with this case, it sound about the same as it did with other brands. In term of using the case, it is more something that I would use once in an while and not full time. That is solely based on how difficult it is to open the charge port as well as the sound quality when playing a video or talking on the phone. I feel it will be useful whenever I am going kayak fishing or hiking. The case, while it looks super sharp when clean, is a fingerprint magnet. The back and the front of the case get dirty and are fairly difficult to clean compared to other screen protectors. Would I buy it again, I would when it comes on sale, I don't think I would pay full price but I do intent to get another one when I replace my phone. I also feel like the regular, non-waterproof case will probably something I get too. I would love for Ghostek to push toward wireless chargers(Car), mounting options, etc.; adapted to their case like some other companies are doing. It would also be great if they made it to fit with a screen protector, given the case will not be on the phone every day, a solution to that issue would be great. It fits, but the usage is so so. 4 Stars overall, because it's very solid, very nice looking and well advertised.

The atomic clear case for the iPhone is good, I just wish the corners had the aluminum on them as well for extra protection. The water proof case is also great! It seems to be work perfectly and is actually 100% waterproof. I did the product test and then did it again with my iPhone inside and no moisture or water got inside the case. I haven’t been able to figure out how to attach the string loop you put on the waterproof case for easier carrying though

Edit: Thanks to customer support for resolving my issue and being fair on the refund! This is now sorted and I understand that the issue was a combination of misunderstanding and bad luck. All ended well.Original review for context:I placed my order on the 12th of November.The order was shipped promptly and I was provided a DHL tracking number.Soon after, the DHL tracking wasn’t updating anymore so on the 24th I sent an email to Ghostek asking if they knew what was happening with my package. But they never answer back.On the 30th of November I sent a kind reminder.. but no answer.On the 7th of December I sent another reminder.. but again no answer.On the 8th of December, I go package hunting at 2 of my local post offices and I was able to find the package which changed delivery method mid-journey and was handled by the local post office service now.Anyway, at this point I am happy because even after 1 month I got my package but instead of an iphone 15 case I was sent some kind of a foldable case.So now I ve sent my 5th email requesting a full return and refund + the additional costs of local VAT and import taxes I incurred with little faith that I will ever receive an answer.Ghostek seems to be living up to its name, ghosting customers.I just hope someone from the company sees this and gets in touch. I have no interest in your products anymore and I just want my money back.

Review.Titre: The phone case is everything it is…
Review.Contenu: The phone case is everything it is advertised as. The case is a little big and the plug cover for the charger hole is hard to open which is probably needed to be as it is advertised to be water proof up to 20meters for an hour. Not willing to test that theory on a brand new $1800 phone. Easy to install over phone and the ghostek logo is boss! Would be 5 stars except the delivery service took over 2 weeks to deliver.
Phone cover fits perfectly.Shipping was also very efficient.Highly recommend.
The protective screen cover scratches too easily. I think I just rubbed it with the cloth that was provided and it scratched. I think that is my only critique. It fits well.

Review.Titre: Everything is good just the case has…
Review.Contenu: Everything is good just the case has the smallest flaw in that the power button will engage at first for about an 8hr period on and of and over n over I ended up somewhat Id call stretching it to where it didn't engage anymore

my phone sometimes has trouble closing all the way with this case on. its a good protector i wish there were more options with color & design in my phones particular model. It seems like everything has a ton of apple iphone selections but not enough Samsung selections.

Love the overall case, very well made. Just wished that there was something on the case so I could put an accessory like a lanyard on it. Had to use a dremel in order to put holes in it so I can attach my lanyard on it as i know i wouldnt drop it as often as I would without it, but other than that loving the case!

I had ordered two items, but when I received my package, there was only one delivered. (So, I can't give the full five starts) But when I contacted customer service, they responded quickly, and I received my second item within a week. I was very grateful and impressed. I appreciate the excellent customer service, and I love the products. They should have a 4 1/2 stars.

Review.Titre: Great customer service, company, phone cases & accessories!
Review.Contenu: Great customer service! Excellent quality products! Quick shipment of my order. My advice is to get customer input about designs before putting out cases. I bought the atomic slim 4 case for my Samsung galaxy z fold 5 and found 2 over looked issues that other high end companies have addressed. First, the back hinge protector is big and the space it has should have been utilized for storage and protection of the s pen. That would have been a great way to give more purpose to each part of the phone case and the z fold's well known accessory. Secondly the space for the finger print button access on the side is too narrow and greatly hinders using that function for quick access into a locked phone. Improvements are needed regarding both points. Otherwise the case is truly well designed and of fantastic quality!! 8 out of 10 rating. Great company with innovative designs!

I love my pixel 7 case. I purchased 2 of them one for myself and 1 for my wife..only complaint was shipping took 7 days....I am in carpentry and construction so I'm anxious to see how durable the case will be over time...overall 9.5 out of 10 on look and quality !

I think the sides of the case would benefit from a much "gripper" if that word applies, lol when holding the case with phone. The grips are too small to make any difference when holding. A much more tactile feel and stickier grip really helps I think when holding the phone.

The case is amazing. The color was bit brighter than I expected which was awesome. Brighter would be better. Only downfall was the back so shiny/ slick it showed every smudge & fingerprint 😥 I ended up painting it to avoid the smudged mess

I thought the product looked great but I was hoping to get one of the limited edition cases but they were all sold out with no mention if they would ever be re-stocked. Secondly, I didn't think about the case being aluminum but now that I have it I don't like the hard feel of it in my hand. I'll be getting a different case before winter sets in that will have a softer grip.

Review.Titre: I purchased a nautical swim case
Review.Contenu: I purchased a nautical swim case.  Knowing it's a waterproof case. As the case was the speakers were muffled and microphone clarity was non existent.  I removed all the plastic covers. Knowing it voids the warranty. Makes a huge difference. The phone is already water proof.  The finger print stickers are ugly. The phone recognizes the finger print without it.  Overall it's a good case.

Review.Titre: Covers parts of fold 4 front screen
Review.Contenu: This is my second ghostek case, I loved my first one for my s21 ultra and my wife is happy with hers for her pixel 7 pro. However I have a few issues with my new case for my fold 4. For the most part the case is solid and does as intended but the glue strip that holds the case to the phone didn't hold well and shifts around and covers part of the front screen.

Great case so far! Phone case construction feels sturdy and functions well. The extruded buttons are a nice functional feature, almost too easy to press accidentally. If possible the buttons could be more low profile. The back of the phone case would be much better if it was a “one-piece” solid plastic design using the same material as the surround rather than the gloss black insert that is prone to scratches (it’s just an unnecessary extra seam that can fail). The MagSafe insignia on the back is ugly, find a way to integrate the MagSafe technology with the Ghostek symbol or hide it completely (make the symbol gloss black against the black satin/matte case). It would make a much more sleek design. The Lifeproof Fre charging port cover/seal is a better design; easier to use and better looking. I hope this case can handle water just as well. I am so glad this case uses a harder plastic rather than the rubbery surround from the lifeproof fre because it wears quickly and loses its adhesion which causes it to basically fall apart. My favorite part about this case is the price point. It is so much more appropriate than other brands. I will buy three of these cases before I buy one rip-off lifeproof or otter box case!

Review.Titre: Got the case for my galaxy s22 ultra…
Review.Contenu: Got the case for my galaxy s22 ultra after some crazy shipping to get here. Love the case. Wish the fingerprint sticker was an option as I don't use mine. The main drawback to the case is in my line of work the plastic screen cover scratches way too much and easy. But it does keep the actual phone screen itself safe from metal chips.

Review.Titre: I do not like the design for the new iPhone Pro Max Case
Review.Contenu: I do not like the design for the new iPhone pro max cases. The action button is covered in plastic when it should be a button like all the rest. It’s hard to fit my fat fingers inside there. Other than that, I love the capabilities the case offers.

The case is made well. The card holder that attaches to the back is sturdy & stays on. I am very disappointed the case is not magnetic. I bought Ghostek because the last case I had was Ghostek & worked beautifully on my car magnet. This one is not magnetic so I ordered a different case from Casebus that’s magnetic with the card holder. I would’ve really liked an option that was magnetic with a card holder for the iPhone I have, otherwise it is a good product.
Good..... Perfection and robust....But I notice that it's not mend for universal wireless contact power bank

Review.Titre: The Case is nice but the part that…
Review.Contenu: The Case is nice but the part that covers the hinge on the Z Fold 4 is flimsy plastic that popped off and broke off of one drop. Plus the fingerprint sensor is blocked by Case. I feel like I need a $50-$100 gift card if I paid $225 for this case and it broke on one drop. Now my hinge is not protected.
Experience was great. The only issue I have with the case is that it covers a little too much of the front screen and I am unable to swipe out my side menu. Other than that, it works great!

Bought the Nautical slim because I wanted a waterproof case. Had a waterproof Otterbox Defender on my old Pixel XL and tried to get another but they don't make the same type for the new Pixel 7. There is not enough protection on the Ghostek cover for the back of the phone, no rubber or hard plastic just a thin clear plastic insert like the screen protector on the front. I am hoping it is more rugged than it looks. Price was good compared to other covers available just don't know how durable and waterproof it will eventually end up being.

Review.Titre: Case is great, caution screen fingerprint reader
Review.Contenu: Case is great, however fingerprint scanner sticker (pixel 6 pro)/any on screen fingerprint reader device totally kills the screen experience if you get it dirty.Ghostek do you have a recommended method to clean? They do provide a set of little stickers to place on it to protect it, but next to impossible to prevent a tiny specs of dust getting on it over time. Aside from that an absolutely fantastic case and do recommend!

I got the nautical slim for the s23 ultra.+ lighter and less bulky than the other nautical (I had that one on a s9+ and iPhone xr)+ opens easy, shuts tight + great fall protection - After removing the case once and then putting it back on the phone the fingerprint scanner doesn't work properly. Some kind of airbubble keeps forming with prevents the scanner from working.

The actual design of the case is beautiful and I can see it being very protective. I haven't dropped my phone crazy yet, but I have been known to accidently fling it across the room. I can tell this case will be fitting of my needs and keep my phone safe from me 🤣🤣 the only reason I gave 4 stars is cause the case was borderline late to show up. I know it's not the necessarily company's fault, but they do give delivery estimates before you purchase.

Original review stated item hadn't arrived. Postage was longer than the stated timeframe, nearly a month. Case itself is fantastic.  Very protective,  strong.  Easy to hold,  buttons are easy to find and use,  though I don't really like the look of them,  they are very functional.  Definitely feel my phone is safe.  Use of phone is not impared, no issue with sound quality, login, charging etc.

Review.Titre: Iphone 14 pro excellent but some MagSafe accessories don't fit
Review.Contenu: I purchased via UK Mobile Fun the Ghostek Iphone 14 Pro case. It's only available in one finish but it's very good. The MagSafe magnet is very strong and my only grip is that the Apple MagSafe wallet will not stay on as  the bottom  camera surround blocks it.The same issue with the official apple MagSafe battery does not fit due to that lip but it does turn sideways to just fit but not securely.I was impressed with the item that I purchased the Ghostek Atomic for my other phone the Google Pixel 7 pro.

Review.Titre: Spine piece broke in my pocket
Review.Contenu: Spine piece broke in my pocket. When I directly emailed info@ghostek I got an automated reply followed by a claims rep. After verification of damage I am being sent a replacement. Very good customer service in my experience. Thanks Ghostek

I work in a field where I get wet a lot and this case is perfect for not worrying about damaging my phone if it unexpectedly gets wet. Only slight complaint is it makes the fingerprint sensor almost unusable.

Review.Titre: The Ghostek Galaxy z fold 4 Exc is…
Review.Contenu: The Ghostek Galaxy z fold 4 Exc is solid and well made. Installation was easy and fast. The only reason why I don't give it a 5 star is because there's no car mount or anyway to mount your phone in your car. Hopefully they come out with an attachment soon.

Review.Titre: Just took a little bit to long for delivery
Review.Contenu: Just took a little bit to long

The construction of this case is solid. Fairly good fit to the phone. Not too bulky. Only complaint I have is the front part of the case isn't perfectly centered, the left side goes over the screen edge by about an 1/8 of an inch. Otherwise, I'm fairly happy with this case.

Review.Titre: I was looking for a military grade…
Review.Contenu: I was looking for a military grade phone case for my pixel 7 pro andGhostek had everything I was looking for. Delivery was reasonable considering all the logistics issues of today's market. They are a US based company out of Brooklyn, NY. I would definitely recommend this company.

I love the aluminum cases.  They always ship fast.  Though I ended up with the wrong case somehow and customer service never responded (that I saw).  I ended up reordering the right case.  The price point is cheap enough that it doesn't irritate me too bad.  Though the price has risen sharply in the last few years.

No one could hear me talk and I had difficulty hearing them.    But I bought it solely  for the screen protection and phone protection, so I just removed the waterproof film over the microphone and speakers and it works great now.

Review.Titre: I love the look and colors
Review.Contenu: I love the look and colors. The only complaint would be the bottom at the charging port should have a rubber stopper or some kind of dust protector by the USB port. The side grips are a hard rubber and pretty slick. If they were maybe an interchangeable softer rubber they might be better suited for grip. My plan is to cut up a couple straps of the hogue pistol grip wrap and replace the side rubber. Outside of thoes features. I love it. The otterbox defender i am used to are good but they are boring as all hell.

I really like this case, especially cause I can attach a line to it. Being a boater, it is not only important to have it waterproof, but I need to have it secure so I do not loose it into the water. The one problem, which is to be expected is that I have to be careful to speak right into the microphone. It is as easy to order and was delivered when expected.

Review.Titre: Great Beautiful Case, kickstand needs work
Review.Contenu: I liked the case, clean, slim, and modern.I did not look like the accessory phone strap I purchased as the kickstand is broken.The cases are built well, the accessory is not; would like a reimbursement as possible.Possibly would be better to use a light alloy rather than plastic.

Review.Titre: Case is great and arrived quickly
Review.Contenu: Case is great and came very quick.  Only thing i wish theyd change is the "thumbprint" sticker on the inside of the screen protector it should be optional not come already installed cause it doesnt come off.

I love my new case! My only problem with it is that I have to close the hinge part, it doesn't close automatically when the cover is closed! I would definitely buy from you again as the cases are made and perform well!

Review.Titre: Decent case, but poor wallet idea
Review.Contenu: Ghostek was offering the only wallet case for the new S23 at the time of my order.  Shipping was prompt. Product without the magnetized wallet part is super nice and easy to hold. Magnet on wallet part isn't strong enough to keep it together in your pocket.

Review.Titre: Case is very sturdy and offers great…
Review.Contenu: Case is very sturdy and offers great protection. The grip is not very good though and the case does make the phone very heavy. The MagSafe is a strong connection to the MagSafe car phone holder but the weight of the phone with the case on is the biggest negative. Also slightly overpriced compared to the likes of Mous and Otterbox. Presentation box is good quality to be fair.
Extremely easy to put it on the phone, but it was pricey for the aramid limit edition. Wonder what aom CF would be like. Fits great, and protects everything.

There is no doubt Ghostek makes durable phone cases.  My last case for an S21+ was an all time fav.  My most recent case for the S23 ultra provides excellent protection but ov erall is a bit heavy.  I purchased the wallet version with the wallet attaching magnetically...it holds to the main case with  just the right force to keep it firmly in place. Furthermore, when I need to remove it for, say, charging on my charging pad, it removes without excessive force...an amazing balance between the two design conditions for the wallet.  However, I am a bit disappointed in the physical design of the wallet in that it has a magnetic cover over the 3 cards it holds. If the cards are a bit misaligned the cover will not close forcing a pause to move them around into position so it can engage the magetic closure mechanism.  The cover can be used to put the phone in stand mode which is a great feature.  Overall, a thoughtfully designed case.

Review.Titre: More good than bad and worth it
Review.Contenu: I really like the look and feel of the case as well as the strong magsafe magnet. Plus the wallet is great as well. You sure weren't lying about the "fits up to 3 cards". 3 fit perfectly but it you try to also put a dollar bill or anything else in there it won't close. Fitment was/is an issue. The phone doesn't sit as firmly in the case as it's designed to. The shock absorbing inner rubber things push it out slightly causing the case to partially cover the lower speaker and mic. Not enough to effect calls but still noticable. It also means that if I push on the camera bar a little it pops the phone out. Overall I really like it and haven't had any troubles yet

It's durable, looks great and protects in all the right areas. It sits a bit higher above the screen sides than my other cases so I'm happy about that. Doesn't add too much girth to the phone but it's definitely heavy. Try not to drop it on your face in bed!!

Love the nautical slim case for my pixel.  I also got the universal belt clip holder/stand.  Not thrilled about the stand though, the clamps cover my volume buttons so it automatically turns my volume down to vibrate.  gave it to my wife and fits her galaxy s22 well.  wish the universal holder fit my pixel.  would be 5 stars if it did

Review.Titre: Cute case and light compared to my…
Review.Contenu: Cute case and light compared to my otter box symmetry or whatever lol but just wished the edges would be raised a little more just a tab to protect it a little more other than that it's been good.

Review.Titre: The case is great except for the hinge
Review.Contenu: The case is great except for the hinge.  The hinge should be crafted so it closes automatically rather than closing it manually.

Review.Titre: I've had it for almost two weeks now
Review.Contenu: I've had it for almost two weeks now, I love my Prismatic Ghostek case.The case is of good quality and is well made. I feel my phone is protected.I gave it 4 stars (a high praise from me, as I am very critical of phone cases) for a few reasons. The clear plastic back is quite slippery, especially after holding your phone for an extended amount of time. I found my hand would get sweaty and if I were holding the phone sideways for game playing or streaming, and I'd lose my grip on the phone. I ended up buying a Mobi Handle to fix that problem. I like quality products. I am not a rich person, but I also can't justify putting a $1400 phone in a cheap $10 case (hence me choosing to buy this case, after reading many reviews and watching product videos.)The only other issue I have is with the grips on the sides of the phone.There is a hard edge to them that makes them uncomfortable to hold.I wish the grip part was a softer material. I am a woman, I have small hands and need to hold the phone (an S23 Ultra, a big phone) with a tighter grip.This issue probably won't bother people with larger hands.All in all, I am very happy with my purchase. I even bought my mom one in Purple. She loves it as well.I hope the prismatic colors hold up and it lasts for a few years.

Title: Excellent Protection and Seamless ExperienceI recently purchased the Google Pixel 7 Series Rugged Full Body Waterproof Case — NAUTICAL slim for my Pixel 7 Pro, and my experience from ordering to daily use has been exceptional. The ease of ordering on their website made the process hassle-free, and the timely shipping ensured I received the product at my doorstep promptly.One of the standout features is how well the case fits my phone; it's like a second skin. The minimal impact on the phone's thickness is commendable, providing a sleek and comfortable feel without compromising on protection. The case offers a perfect balance between a slim design and robust defense.The waterproof nature of the case has proven to be a game-changer. On more than one occasion, it has safeguarded my phone from unexpected encounters with water. The added layer of protection is a reassuring feature, especially for those who lead an active lifestyle or find themselves in unpredictable weather conditions.This isn't my first Google Pixel 7 Series case, and it certainly won't be my last. The durability and reliability of their products are evident. My only reason for purchasing a second case was due to an unfortunate incident that punctured the film over the flash, compromising the waterproofing. However, this incident only reinforced my trust in the product.In conclusion, the Google Pixel 7 Series Rugged Full Body Waterproof Case — NAUTICAL slim is a great investment for anyone looking for top-notch protection without sacrificing style. I highly recommend it and will continue to choose this series for all my future phone case needs.

This is my second case from Ghostek and I couldn’t be happier. 1) quality: these cases feel substantial but not heavy or bulky. It’s clear they use good materials. The finishes last even after me abusing my old phone for over a year. 2) style: I think these are some of the best looking cases on the market. The Atomic slim is sleek but utilitarian/military inspired, color ways are great and they’ve added more styles/colors since my first. 3) safe: I’m not gentle on phones…I drop mine frequently and toss it around and on the floor at the gym. My phone looked as good as the day I got it when I traded it in. 4) mag safe means mag safe: this case anchors my phone on its charger/mount like nothing else. I never have to worry my phone falling off no matter what I’ve done to it. You truly cannot go wrong with a Ghostek case. Otter who?
